comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: More of the Tatum divorce case. Terence J. McManus (note spelling) was a lawyer (d. 1950, age 79).

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He long outlived his client. J.C. Tatum, the cotton broker, died in April of 1916, of pneumonia. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E06E2DB1331E733A...

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for alerting us of the typo in the title.  And thanks for the additional information on John C. Tatum and Terence McManus.  We will add the information to the record.
